page.title: 11Transport in Hastings
page.content: My dad is a railway guard based at Hastings station. He works on trains in the south east of England.He issues tickets on the train and looks after the mail and articles in the guards van.My brother Richard is a coach builder on British Rail.He works at Bexhill and sees all the coaches are in good repair.Both Richard and my dad work on a shift system. {By Helen Bexhell Age 11. My dad is a taxi driver, he drives a "London cab". He is based at Hastings Railway Station. My dad's dad was also a taxi driver and that is why my dad is one. My dad has his own cab and works from 8.15am to 7.oopm. After that he has other men to work for him by driving his cab. {By Julie Braham Age 11.
